<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The line table may be empty, which we should skip adding an end entry.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There are two cases:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Given a special op, return the address skip amount (in units of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><Highlight kind="comment">/// DWARF2&#95;LINE&#95;MIN&#95;INSN&#95;LENGTH).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711" lineLink="#a1a45bf6d0fbef0afa6304a0a90d4cc7c"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="#a1a45bf6d0fbef0afa6304a0a90d4cc7c">SpecialAddr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarflinetableparams">MCDwarfLineTableParams</a> Params, uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonbittracker-cpp/#a0ee73ba17c3a2cb54752905e99d77357">op</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Utility function to encode a Dwarf pair of LineDelta and AddrDeltas.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdwarflineaddr/#ae0f19d1d97309d2c250054dae4569622"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdwarflineaddr/#ae0f19d1d97309d2c250054dae4569622">MCDwarfLineAddr::encode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp;Context, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarflinetableparams">MCDwarfLineTableParams</a> Params,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><Highlight kind="normal">                             int64&#95;t LineDelta, uint64&#95;t AddrDelta,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><Highlight kind="normal">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;char&gt;</a> &amp;Out) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint8&#95;t Buf&#91;16&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t Temp, Opcode;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NeedCopy = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The maximum address skip amount that can be encoded with a special op.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t MaxSpecialAddrDelta = <a href="#a1a45bf6d0fbef0afa6304a0a90d4cc7c">SpecialAddr</a>(Params, 255);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Scale the address delta by the minimum instruction length.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><Highlight kind="normal">  AddrDelta = <a href="#a3ce1bed1bbcf6373d4bedd7ef53477f2">ScaleAddrDelta</a>(Context, AddrDelta);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A LineDelta of INT64&#95;MAX is a signal that this is actually a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// DW&#95;LNE&#95;end&#95;sequence. We cannot use special opcodes here, since we want the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end&#95;sequence to emit the matrix entry.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LineDelta == <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#ad0d744f05898e32d01f73f8af3cd2071">INT64&#95;MAX</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AddrDelta == MaxSpecialAddrDelta)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><Highlight kind="normal">      Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(dwarf::DW&#95;LNS&#95;const&#95;add&#95;pc);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AddrDelta) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><Highlight kind="normal">      Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(dwarf::DW&#95;LNS&#95;advance&#95;pc);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><Highlight kind="normal">      Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a7efd1f0c1206d95e4fe01a9b49a57b82">append</a>(Buf, Buf + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad0f8c0e82cde3bb0849fc59e3510f05a">encodeULEB128</a>(AddrDelta, Buf));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><Highlight kind="normal">    Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(dwarf::DW&#95;LNS&#95;extended&#95;op);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><Highlight kind="normal">    Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><Highlight kind="normal">    Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(dwarf::DW&#95;LNE&#95;end&#95;sequence);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Bias the line delta by the base.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><Highlight kind="normal">  Temp = LineDelta - Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarflinetableparams/#afddded28f79b1eccb3a948a4bdd0f6a3">DWARF2LineBase</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the line increment is out of range of a special opcode, we must encode</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it with DW&#95;LNS&#95;advance&#95;line.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Temp &gt;= Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarflinetableparams/#ac75e30002379b9f61625bc8d2b4b1919">DWARF2LineRange</a> ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><Highlight kind="normal">      Temp + Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarflinetableparams/#aa098ab41af3f8cee8b1939003d55a776">DWARF2LineOpcodeBase</a> &gt; 255) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><Highlight kind="normal">    Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(dwarf::DW&#95;LNS&#95;advance&#95;line);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><Highlight kind="normal">    Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a7efd1f0c1206d95e4fe01a9b49a57b82">append</a>(Buf, Buf + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac21006e81ffbbc79e8e51e44f7878053">encodeSLEB128</a>(LineDelta, Buf));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><Highlight kind="normal">    LineDelta = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><Highlight kind="normal">    Temp = 0 - Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarflinetableparams/#afddded28f79b1eccb3a948a4bdd0f6a3">DWARF2LineBase</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><Highlight kind="normal">    NeedCopy = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use DW&#95;LNS&#95;copy instead of a &quot;line +0, addr +0&quot; special opcode.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LineDelta == 0 &amp;&amp; AddrDelta == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><Highlight kind="normal">    Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(dwarf::DW&#95;LNS&#95;copy);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Bias the opcode by the special opcode base.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><Highlight kind="normal">  Temp += Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarflinetableparams/#aa098ab41af3f8cee8b1939003d55a776">DWARF2LineOpcodeBase</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Avoid overflow when addr&#95;delta is large.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AddrDelta &lt; 256 + MaxSpecialAddrDelta) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try using a special opcode.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><Highlight kind="normal">    Opcode = Temp + AddrDelta &#42; Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarflinetableparams/#ac75e30002379b9f61625bc8d2b4b1919">DWARF2LineRange</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode &lt;= 255) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try using DW&#95;LNS&#95;const&#95;add&#95;pc followed by special op.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><Highlight kind="normal">    Opcode = Temp + (AddrDelta - MaxSpecialAddrDelta) &#42; Params.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcdwarflinetableparams/#ac75e30002379b9f61625bc8d2b4b1919">DWARF2LineRange</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the size of each item in the header (see below where we emit these items).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Figure the padding after the header before the table of address and size</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Pad = 2 &#42; AddrSize - (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878af6d9f1c7b49b7601fae6a545002a6763">Length</a> &amp; (2 &#42; AddrSize - 1));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Pad == 2 &#42; AddrSize)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
